remarks: A non-conditional definition of the group order.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Sep-2015.)
statement:
odcl.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
odcl.2 $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
odid.3 $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
odid.4 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
odval2 $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X ) -> ( O ` A ) = ( iota_ x e. NN0 A. y e. NN0 ( x || y <-> ( y .x. A ) = .0. ) ) ) $.
$d .0. y $.
$d .x. y $.
$d A x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d O x y $.
$d X x y $.
